title: No Bake Pecan Coconut Praline Cookies
directions: In a large saucepan, mix together the sugar, evaporated milk, corn syrup and butter and bring to a boil then boil for 3 minutes.
Turn off the heat and stir in the pecans, coconut and vanilla. Cook for 4 minutes constantly stirring.
Drop a spoonful of batter on wax paper and let it cool to harden and voila!
